articles.title: Carrie Ann Inaba reveals she tested positive for coronavirus and has a 'bad' cough - Daily Mail
articles.description: Dancing With The Stars' judge Carrie Ann Inaba revealed she has tested positive for coronavirus in a new Instagram video, which showed her hoarsely coughing.
